Exploring and testing the solar photovoltaic model.

Load libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

Load data
```{r}
load(file = (here("Data", "sierraczosolar.rda")))
```

run model with sierra data
```{r}
solarpv(area = 0.1, 
        solar = sierraczosolar,
        eff = 0.6, clr = "green", eunit = "kW", g = FALSE)
```
